original_text: So Jesus said to them, ‘A man must not send his wife away and then marry another woman. If he does that, he has not been faithful to his wife. It is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife.
korean_text: 이르시되 누구든지 그 아내를 버리고 다른 데에 장가 드는 자는 본처에게 간음을 행함이요

sentences.original_text: 'A man must not send his wife away

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 여자와 결혼해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: he has not been faithful to his wife
It is the same as if
he had sex with another man's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다른 남자의 아내와 성관계를 가진 것과 같다
